content.raw: This makes the method defined by default, though it is not be applicable to all formats. The method also fails for `referenceableParamGroupRef` which has the attribute `ref` without the preceding `_`, preventing it from being resolved. We could add an extra check for `k == 'ref'` to deal with that, but I'm not sure if that should go in an `mzML` specific implementation.
